text:

creator: zhengcl@east.net
yoavs@computer.org
text:
Try 4.1.31 or better yet a 5.x release.  4.1.18 is ancient and hundreds of bug 
fixes have been made to the code since it was released.  Unless you can 
conclusively prove this is a Tomcat but againast 4.1.31, please don't reopen 
this issue.  Thanks.

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
Please use the tomcat-user list for help.

http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/faq/

creator: zhengcl@east.net
text:
I have tried 4.1.31.but it do not runing as well.
LifecycleException:  This server has not yet been started
        at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardServer.stop
(StandardServer.java:2166)
        at org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina.start(Catalina.java:494)
        at org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina.execute(Catalina.java:350)
        at org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina.process(Catalina.java:129)

(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)

What's wrong???
And my OS is AS3.0.

Many people run Tomcat with jdk 1.4.2, you are doing something wrong.  Read the 
faq, search the archives, read the docs, ask on the users lists, but don't open 
a bug.
creator: Keith@Apache.org
